content: Hi All, is there any module in hapi api which helps in converting R4 bundle to hl7 messages?

If you mean HL7 v2, check out the #v2 to FHIR stream. Be aware that it won't be a straight-forward conversion and will also require variation from site to site because of differences in how v2 is handled in different locations.
Yes. I meant from R4 bundle to hl7v2 for each patient
